Reviews.Title: Small Camera - Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Big Ed
Reviews.Content: I installed this camera by my front door and it works great.  I paid less than $100 when I bought this thing in 2010.  The lens cap comes off and you can manually adjust the focus to your liking.  There is a set screw to keep the lens set once the desired focus is achieved.

Reviews.Title: bullet camera
Reviews.Author: htf
Reviews.Content: This camera is horrible and a waste of money. It is completely out of focus due to ppoor manufacturing and quality control.
